elements.text:
You and your partner both have strong opinions and you don't always agree with each other. Over dinner one evening, you get into a heated argument about a topic that is a passion of yours.

Here are some feelings that might happen in the moment:

texts: I'm grateful to have a partner who cares so much about important issues.
I'm disappointed that we disagree on this point, but I know it's normal for couples to have disagreements.
I'm upset that we got into a fight, but hopeful that we can move forward from this.
I feel respected as we discuss our differences in opinion.
I'm furious that we don't see eye to eye on this.
